charges.charge_description: Count 1: 8:1326A.F Illegal entry after deportation. Penalty: 0 to 20 yrs and/or $250,000 fine; $100 cvf; 0 to 3 yrs tsr. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE: 84 mos imprisonment to 5:99CR79, 3 yrs TSR, no fine, Court recommends: Placement in Texas, the Court does not object to placement in Drug Program, $100 CVF, deft remanded to the custody of the US Marshal, Court advised deft of his righ t to appeal, advised of 10 day deadline, 5:99CR-Revoked-24 mos imprisonment, The deft indicates he would like to appeal-The Ct. instructs the clerks to do so.

charges.charge_description: Knowingly and willingly re-entered the U. S. after having been previously denied admission, excluded, deported, or removed, or has departed the United States while an order of exclusion, deportation or removal is outstanding. [5:02-m-3168]
